summary:
This mod changes the One-Handed Perks to give Daggers increased Critical Hit Bonuses.
Designed mainly with Ranged Users in mind, who like to carry a dagger as a secondary weapon.
descriptionHtml:
Critical Daggers is a Perk Enhancement Mod, which adds effects to the existing Perks in the One-Handed perk tree.
The effects added are purely Critical Hit Chance (To the \"Armsman\" Perks) and Critical Hit Damage (To the \"Bladesman\" Perks).

It\'s a small mod, but it was made to give Dagger-wielding Characters a chance with regular combat. (Especially in cases where combat is unavoidable).
WARNING: The chances of getting critical hits are still low enough to be uncertain, and therefore it\'s still a risk to go into battle with only a Dagger. It is less risky than before, however.

I hope you enjoy this mod, any and all feedback is welcome as long as there\'s a reason for it.
author: Oriviath
